name: my son, charlie
description:
there is no loading bar, so it will be a blank screen while loading. ^^;;

feel free to let it load in the background. please, be patient!!

this is a beta version of my upcoming game, my son, charlie.

i made this version for a school assignment with a tight deadline.

you guys can be my testers.

please comment which ending you got or any feedback you have.

any comment will be appreciated!

i will be releasing an improved version on steam (june 2023) so be sure to keep a lookout.
